name: Junior Division - Eureka Valley Team
description: The SFRPD Youth Flag Football League is a co-ed non-contact 5 x 5 league with an emphasis finesse and technique, with running plays, passing plays and route running. Players will have the opportunity to learn different positions and build the skills needed to be successful at each position. Players will participate in 5 on 5 passing only non-blocking league, all participants will play in a healthy competitive environment where they can use the skills they learn and apply them in High school spor

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
